associateapprovalruletemplatewithreposit.name: AssociateApprovalRuleTemplateWithRepository
associateapprovalruletemplatewithreposit.description: Grants permission to associate an approval rule template with a repository

batchassociateapprovalruletemplatewithre.name: BatchAssociateApprovalRuleTemplateWithRepositories
batchassociateapprovalruletemplatewithre.description: Grants permission to associate an approval rule template with multiple repositories in a single operation

batchdescribemergeconflicts.name: BatchDescribeMergeConflicts
batchdescribemergeconflicts.description: Grants permission to get information about multiple merge conflicts when attempting to merge two commits using either the three-way merge or the squash merge option

batchdisassociateapprovalruletemplatefro.name: BatchDisassociateApprovalRuleTemplateFromRepositories
batchdisassociateapprovalruletemplatefro.description: Grants permission to remove the association between an approval rule template and multiple repositories in a single operation

batchgetcommits.name: BatchGetCommits
batchgetcommits.description: Grants permission to return information about one or more commits in an AWS CodeCommit repository

batchgetpullrequests.name: BatchGetPullRequests
batchgetpullrequests.description: Grants permission to return information about one or more pull requests in an AWS CodeCommit repository

batchgetrepositories.name: BatchGetRepositories
batchgetrepositories.description: Grants permission to get information about multiple repositories

canceluploadarchive.name: CancelUploadArchive
canceluploadarchive.description: Grants permission to cancel the uploading of an archive to a pipeline in AWS CodePipeline

createapprovalruletemplate.name: CreateApprovalRuleTemplate
createapprovalruletemplate.description: Grants permission to create an approval rule template that will automatically create approval rules in pull requests that match the conditions defined in the template; does not grant permission to create approval rules for individual pull requests

createbranch.name: CreateBranch
createbranch.description: Grants permission to create a branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository with this API; does not control Git create branch actions

createcommit.name: CreateCommit
createcommit.description: Grants permission to add, copy, move or update single or multiple files in a branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository, and generate a commit for the changes in the specified branch

createpullrequest.name: CreatePullRequest
createpullrequest.description: Grants permission to create a pull request in the specified repository

createpullrequestapprovalrule.name: CreatePullRequestApprovalRule
createpullrequestapprovalrule.description: Grants permission to create an approval rule specific to an individual pull request; does not grant permission to create approval rule templates

createrepository.name: CreateRepository
createrepository.description: Grants permission to create an AWS CodeCommit repository

createunreferencedmergecommit.name: CreateUnreferencedMergeCommit
createunreferencedmergecommit.description: Grants permission to create an unreferenced commit that contains the result of merging two commits using either the three-way or the squash merge option; does not control Git merge actions

deleteapprovalruletemplate.name: DeleteApprovalRuleTemplate
deleteapprovalruletemplate.description: Grants permission to delete an approval rule template

deletebranch.name: DeleteBranch
deletebranch.description: Grants permission to delete a branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository with this API; does not control Git delete branch actions

deletecommentcontent.name: DeleteCommentContent
deletecommentcontent.description: Grants permission to delete the content of a comment made on a change, file, or commit in a repository

deletefile.name: DeleteFile
deletefile.description: Grants permission to delete a specified file from a specified branch

deletepullrequestapprovalrule.name: DeletePullRequestApprovalRule
deletepullrequestapprovalrule.description: Grants permission to delete approval rule created for a pull request if the rule was not created by an approval rule template

deleterepository.name: DeleteRepository
deleterepository.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS CodeCommit repository

describemergeconflicts.name: DescribeMergeConflicts
describemergeconflicts.description: Grants permission to get information about specific merge conflicts when attempting to merge two commits using either the three-way or the squash merge option

describepullrequestevents.name: DescribePullRequestEvents
describepullrequestevents.description: Grants permission to return information about one or more pull request events

disassociateapprovalruletemplatefromrepo.name: DisassociateApprovalRuleTemplateFromRepository
disassociateapprovalruletemplatefromrepo.description: Grants permission to remove the association between an approval rule template and a repository

evaluatepullrequestapprovalrules.name: EvaluatePullRequestApprovalRules
evaluatepullrequestapprovalrules.description: Grants permission to evaluate whether a pull request is mergable based on its current approval state and approval rule requirements

getapprovalruletemplate.name: GetApprovalRuleTemplate
getapprovalruletemplate.description: Grants permission to return information about an approval rule template

getblob.name: GetBlob
getblob.description: Grants permission to view the encoded content of an individual file in an AWS CodeCommit repository from the AWS CodeCommit console

getbranch.name: GetBranch
getbranch.description: Grants permission to get details about a branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository with this API; does not control Git branch actions

getcomment.name: GetComment
getcomment.description: Grants permission to get the content of a comment made on a change, file, or commit in a repository

getcommentreactions.name: GetCommentReactions
getcommentreactions.description: Grants permission to get the reactions on a comment

getcommentsforcomparedcommit.name: GetCommentsForComparedCommit
getcommentsforcomparedcommit.description: Grants permission to get information about comments made on the comparison between two commits

getcommentsforpullrequest.name: GetCommentsForPullRequest
getcommentsforpullrequest.description: Grants permission to get comments made on a pull request

getcommit.name: GetCommit
getcommit.description: Grants permission to return information about a commit, including commit message and committer information, with this API; does not control Git log actions

getcommithistory.name: GetCommitHistory
getcommithistory.description: Grants permission to get information about the history of commits in a repository

getcommitsfrommergebase.name: GetCommitsFromMergeBase
getcommitsfrommergebase.description: Grants permission to get information about the difference between commits in the context of a potential merge

getdifferences.name: GetDifferences
getdifferences.description: Grants permission to view information about the differences between valid commit specifiers such as a branch, tag, HEAD, commit ID, or other fully qualified reference

getfile.name: GetFile
getfile.description: Grants permission to return the base-64 encoded contents of a specified file and its metadata

getfolder.name: GetFolder
getfolder.description: Grants permission to return the contents of a specified folder in a repository

getmergecommit.name: GetMergeCommit
getmergecommit.description: Grants permission to get information about a merge commit created by one of the merge options for pull requests that creates merge commits. Not all merge options create merge commits. This permission does not control Git merge actions

getmergeconflicts.name: GetMergeConflicts
getmergeconflicts.description: Grants permission to get information about merge conflicts between the before and after commit IDs for a pull request in a repository

getmergeoptions.name: GetMergeOptions
getmergeoptions.description: Grants permission to get information about merge options for pull requests that can be used to merge two commits; does not control Git merge actions

getobjectidentifier.name: GetObjectIdentifier
getobjectidentifier.description: Grants permission to resolve blobs, trees, and commits to their identifier

getpullrequest.name: GetPullRequest
getpullrequest.description: Grants permission to get information about a pull request in a specified repository

getpullrequestapprovalstates.name: GetPullRequestApprovalStates
getpullrequestapprovalstates.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current approvals on an inputted pull request

getpullrequestoverridestate.name: GetPullRequestOverrideState
getpullrequestoverridestate.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current override state of a given pull request

getreferences.name: GetReferences
getreferences.description: Grants permission to get details about references in an AWS CodeCommit repository; does not control Git reference actions

getrepository.name: GetRepository
getrepository.description: Grants permission to get information about an AWS CodeCommit repository

getrepositorytriggers.name: GetRepositoryTriggers
getrepositorytriggers.description: Grants permission to get information about triggers configured for a repository

gettree.name: GetTree
gettree.description: Grants permission to view the contents of a specified tree in an AWS CodeCommit repository from the AWS CodeCommit console

getuploadarchivestatus.name: GetUploadArchiveStatus
getuploadarchivestatus.description: Grants permission to get status information about an archive upload to a pipeline in AWS CodePipeline

gitpull.name: GitPull
gitpull.description: Grants permission to pull information from an AWS CodeCommit repository to a local repo

gitpush.name: GitPush
gitpush.description: Grants permission to push information from a local repo to an AWS CodeCommit repository

listapprovalruletemplates.name: ListApprovalRuleTemplates
listapprovalruletemplates.description: Grants permission to list all approval rule templates in an AWS Region for the AWS account

listassociatedapprovalruletemplatesforre.name: ListAssociatedApprovalRuleTemplatesForRepository
listassociatedapprovalruletemplatesforre.description: Grants permission to list approval rule templates that are associated with a repository

listbranches.name: ListBranches
listbranches.description: Grants permission to list branches for an AWS CodeCommit repository with this API; does not control Git branch actions

listfilecommithistory.name: ListFileCommitHistory
listfilecommithistory.description: Grants permission to list commits and changes to a specified file

listpullrequests.name: ListPullRequests
listpullrequests.description: Grants permission to list pull requests for a specified repository

listrepositories.name: ListRepositories
listrepositories.description: Grants permission to list information about AWS CodeCommit repositories in the current Region for your AWS account

listrepositoriesforapprovalruletemplate.name: ListRepositoriesForApprovalRuleTemplate
listrepositoriesforapprovalruletemplate.description: Grants permission to list repositories that are associated with an approval rule template

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the resource attached to a CodeCommit resource ARN

mergebranchesbyfastforward.name: MergeBranchesByFastForward
mergebranchesbyfastforward.description: Grants permission to merge two commits into the specified destination branch using the fast-forward merge option

mergebranchesbysquash.name: MergeBranchesBySquash
mergebranchesbysquash.description: Grants permission to merge two commits into the specified destination branch using the squash merge option

mergebranchesbythreeway.name: MergeBranchesByThreeWay
mergebranchesbythreeway.description: Grants permission to merge two commits into the specified destination branch using the three-way merge option

mergepullrequestbyfastforward.name: MergePullRequestByFastForward
mergepullrequestbyfastforward.description: Grants permission to close a pull request and attempt to merge it into the specified destination branch for that pull request at the specified commit using the fast-forward merge option

mergepullrequestbysquash.name: MergePullRequestBySquash
mergepullrequestbysquash.description: Grants permission to close a pull request and attempt to merge it into the specified destination branch for that pull request at the specified commit using the squash merge option

mergepullrequestbythreeway.name: MergePullRequestByThreeWay
mergepullrequestbythreeway.description: Grants permission to close a pull request and attempt to merge it into the specified destination branch for that pull request at the specified commit using the three-way merge option

overridepullrequestapprovalrules.name: OverridePullRequestApprovalRules
overridepullrequestapprovalrules.description: Grants permission to override all approval rules for a pull request, including approval rules created by a template

postcommentforcomparedcommit.name: PostCommentForComparedCommit
postcommentforcomparedcommit.description: Grants permission to post a comment on the comparison between two commits

postcommentforpullrequest.name: PostCommentForPullRequest
postcommentforpullrequest.description: Grants permission to post a comment on a pull request

postcommentreply.name: PostCommentReply
postcommentreply.description: Grants permission to post a comment in reply to a comment on a comparison between commits or a pull request

putcommentreaction.name: PutCommentReaction
putcommentreaction.description: Grants permission to post a reaction on a comment

putfile.name: PutFile
putfile.description: Grants permission to add or update a file in a branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository, and generate a commit for the addition in the specified branch

putrepositorytriggers.name: PutRepositoryTriggers
putrepositorytriggers.description: Grants permission to create, update, or delete triggers for a repository

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to attach resource tags to a CodeCommit resource ARN

testrepositorytriggers.name: TestRepositoryTriggers
testrepositorytriggers.description: Grants permission to test the functionality of repository triggers by sending information to the trigger target

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to disassociate resource tags from a CodeCommit resource ARN

updateapprovalruletemplatecontent.name: UpdateApprovalRuleTemplateContent
updateapprovalruletemplatecontent.description: Grants permission to update the content of approval rule templates; does not grant permission to update content of approval rules created specifically for pull requests

updateapprovalruletemplatedescription.name: UpdateApprovalRuleTemplateDescription
updateapprovalruletemplatedescription.description: Grants permission to update the description of approval rule templates

updateapprovalruletemplatename.name: UpdateApprovalRuleTemplateName
updateapprovalruletemplatename.description: Grants permission to update the name of approval rule templates

updatecomment.name: UpdateComment
updatecomment.description: Grants permission to update the contents of a comment if the identity matches the identity used to create the comment

updatedefaultbranch.name: UpdateDefaultBranch
updatedefaultbranch.description: Grants permission to change the default branch in an AWS CodeCommit repository

updatepullrequestapprovalrulecontent.name: UpdatePullRequestApprovalRuleContent
updatepullrequestapprovalrulecontent.description: Grants permission to update the content for approval rules created for a specific pull requests; does not grant permission to update approval rule content for rules created with an approval rule template

updatepullrequestapprovalstate.name: UpdatePullRequestApprovalState
updatepullrequestapprovalstate.description: Grants permission to update the approval state for pull requests

updatepullrequestdescription.name: UpdatePullRequestDescription
updatepullrequestdescription.description: Grants permission to update the description of a pull request

updatepullrequeststatus.name: UpdatePullRequestStatus
updatepullrequeststatus.description: Grants permission to update the status of a pull request

updatepullrequesttitle.name: UpdatePullRequestTitle
updatepullrequesttitle.description: Grants permission to update the title of a pull request

updaterepositorydescription.name: UpdateRepositoryDescription
updaterepositorydescription.description: Grants permission to change the description of an AWS CodeCommit repository

updaterepositoryencryptionkey.name: UpdateRepositoryEncryptionKey
updaterepositoryencryptionkey.description: Grants permission to change the AWS KMS encryption key used to encrypt and decrypt an AWS CodeCommit repository

updaterepositoryname.name: UpdateRepositoryName
updaterepositoryname.description: Grants permission to change the name of an AWS CodeCommit repository

uploadarchive.name: UploadArchive
uploadarchive.description: Grants permission to the service role for AWS CodePipeline to upload repository changes into a pipeline
